alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Madison; Pickaway; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FAYETTE, NORTHEASTERN CLINTON, WESTERN PICKAWAY, NORTHWESTERN PIKE, NORTHEASTERN HIGHLAND, SOUTHERN MADISON AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jeffersonville to near Hillsboro, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Washington Court House, Circleville, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Waverly, Ashville, Sabina, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Leesburg, Jeffersonville, Marshall, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, Bainbridge, New Holland, Highland Holiday, Logan Elm Village and Pike Lake. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 62 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Madison; Pickaway; Pike; Ross
